00026 // get file ID
00027 $fileID = isset($_GET['fid'])?(integer)$_GET['fid']:0;
00028 // get biblioID
00029 $biblioID = isset($_GET['bid'])?(integer)$_GET['bid']:0;
00030 // get file data
00031 // query file to database
00032 $sql_q = 'SELECT att.*, f.* FROM biblio_attachment AS att
00033     LEFT JOIN files AS f ON att.file_id=f.file_id
00034     WHERE att.file_id='.$fileID.' AND att.biblio_id='.$biblioID.' AND att.access_type=\'public\'';
00035 $file_q = $dbs->query($sql_q);
00036 // check if file exists
00037 if ($file_q->num_rows < 1) {
00038     die();
00039 }
00040 // check if file exists
00041 $file_d = $file_q->fetch_assoc();
00042 $file_loc = REPO_BASE_DIR.str_ireplace('/', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $file_d['file_dir']).DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$file_d['file_name'];
00043 if (!file_exists($file_loc)) {
00044     die();
00045 }
00046 // multimedia URL
00047 $multimedia_url = REPO_DIR.'/'.$file_d['file_dir'].'/'.$file_d['file_name'];
00048 
00049 // flowplayer settings
00050 $splash = SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.IMAGES_DIR.'/senayan-player-splash.png';
00051 $flowplayer_core = JS_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'flowplayer/flowplayer-3.1.0.swf';
00052 $flowplayer_api = JS_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'flowplayer/flowplayer-3.1.0.min.js';
00053 $flowplayer_audio_plugin = JS_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'flowplayer/flowplayer.audio-3.1.0.swf';
00054 ?>
00055 <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
00056 <html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
00057 <head>
00058 <!-- by Hendro Wicaksono -->
00059 <meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
00060 <script type="text/javascript" src="<?php echo $flowplayer_api; ?>"></script>
00061 <title>Senayan Multimedia Viewer</title>
00062 </head>
00063 <body style="padding: 0; margin: 0;">
00064 <a href="#" style="display: block; width: 400px; height: 300px;" id="player"></a>
00065 <script type="text/javascript">
00066 flowplayer("player", "<?php echo $flowplayer_core; ?>", {
00067     plugins: { audio: { url: '<?php echo $flowplayer_audio_plugin; ?>' } },
00068     playlist: [
00069         {
00070             url: '<?php echo $multimedia_url; ?>',
00071             onFinish: function() {
00072                 this.unload();
00073             }
00074         }
00075     ]
00076 });
00077 </script>
00078 </body>
00079 </html>
